revised_title: A Study of a Samnite Denarius and Its Etruscan Inscriptions
tldr: The author examines a Samnite denarius and its Etruscan inscriptions, providing insights into the origins of the coin and its connection to the Veturian family. The study also explores the use of accents in Etruscan and Roman inscriptions and their possible Samnite or Etruscan origins.
